title: Textile, "Academia", 1993
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: Academia Designed by Neil Bottle for Warner Fabrics Copyright MCMCXIII by Warner Fabrics (printed in selvedge)
dimensions:
H x W: 261.6 x 142.2 cm (103 x 56 in.)
Repeat H: 91.4 cm (36 in.)
description: Length of printed cotton with a collage-like arrangement of architectural sketches, botanical drawings, acanthus leaves, penmanship studies, tiles and other patterns in gray, taupe, and pale orange/pink on an off-white ground.
